spring.000: Emily said she can make me a Halloween costume!$h#$b#I'm gonna be a Junimo!$h
spring.001: Wow! Look at all the pretty colors!
spring.002: Hi, Daddy!^Hi, Mommy!$h#$b#I'm not normally allowed back here but Emily said I could!$h#$b#...#$b#Um ... um ... Here's your drink.$l#$b#%Your child hands you an imaginary glass.
spring.003: I'm a pirate and this is my cave of treasures!$h#$b#...#$b#Don't tell Emily I'm in here. It's a secret.
